snippet: The international body’s refugee agency is coordinating an effort to deliver aid by air, land and sea to more than half a million people driven from their homes by fighting.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency will coordinate effort to deliver aid to more than a half-million Iraqis who have been driven from their homes by conflict with the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria; operation is slated to be one of the largest the agency has undertaken in recent years.
lead_paragraph: The international body’s refugee agency is coordinating an effort to deliver aid by air, land and sea to more than half a million people driven from their homes by fighting.

headline.main: U.N. Plans Ambitious Operation to Help Displaced Iraqis
headline.print_headline: U.N. Plans Ambitious Operation to Help Displaced Iraqis

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
